SELECT A.RQSTNO, A.OUT_DT, A.OUT_PLACE, A.EXP_IN_DT, (CASE WHEN D.EXT_DT IS NULL OR D.EXT_DT = '' THEN A.EXP_IN_DT ELSE D.EXT_DT END) AS EXP_IN_DT2, A.REASON_CD, A.REASON, A.GUARD_SIGN_YN, A.GUARD_SIGN_DT, A.GUARD_NAME, B.RQST_REGTIME, B.RQST_USER_NO, B.RQST_USER_NAME, B.RQST_DEPT_NO, B.RQST_DEPT_NAME, B.RQST_TOP_USER_NO, B.RQST_TOP_USER_NAME, B.RQST_ASSET_CNT, B.RQST_STATUS_CD, FN_GET_CMMNCODENAME('COM008', B.RQST_STATUS_CD) RQST_STATUS_NAME, B.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, B.FRST_REGISTER_ID, B.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, B.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, C.RQST_STATUS_CD AS IN_RQST_STATUS_CD, FN_GET_CMMNCODENAME('COM008', C.RQST_STATUS_CD) IN_RQST_STATUS_NAME, C.IN_DT, D.RQST_STATUS_CD AS EXT_RQST_STATUS_CD, FN_GET_CMMNCODENAME('COM008', D.RQST_STATUS_CD) EXT_RQST_STATUS_NAME, D.EXT_DT FROM RFID_APPR_IO_OUT A INNER JOIN RFID_APPR_RQST B ON A.RQSTNO = B.RQSTNO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT T1.* FROM RFID_APPR_IO_IN T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT RQSTNO, MAX(IN_RQSTNO) IN_RQSTNO FROM RFID_APPR_IO_IN WHERE RQST_STATUS_CD = '3' GROUP BY RQSTNO ) T2 ON T1.IN_RQSTNO = T2.IN_RQSTNO ) C ON A.RQSTNO = C.RQSTNO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT T1.* FROM RFID_APPR_IO_EXT T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT RQSTNO, MAX(EXT_RQSTNO) EXT_RQSTNO FROM RFID_APPR_IO_EXT WHERE RQST_STATUS_CD = '3' GROUP BY RQSTNO ) T2 ON T1.EXT_RQSTNO = T2.EXT_RQSTNO ) D ON A.RQSTNO = D.RQSTNO WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY RQSTNO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RFID_APPR_IO_OUT A INNER JOIN RFID_APPR_RQST B ON A.RQSTNO = B.RQSTNO WHERE 1=1

SELECT A.RQSTNO, A.OUT_DT, A.OUT_PLACE, A.EXP_IN_DT, A.REASON_CD, A.REASON, A.GUARD_SIGN_YN, A.GUARD_SIGN_DT, A.GUARD_NAME, B.RQST_REGTIME, B.RQST_USER_NO, B.RQST_USER_NAME, B.RQST_DEPT_NO, B.RQST_DEPT_NAME, B.RQST_TOP_USER_NO, B.RQST_TOP_USER_NAME, B.RQST_ASSET_CNT, B.RQST_STATUS_CD, FN_GET_CMMNCODENAME('COM008', B.RQST_STATUS_CD) RQST_STATUS_NAME, B.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, B.FRST_REGISTER_ID, B.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, B.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, D.ASSET_SEQ, D.ASSET_NO, D.ASSET_NAME, D.ITEM_CD, D.ITEM_NAME, E.EXT_DT, F.IN_DT FROM RFID_APPR_IO_OUT A INNER JOIN RFID_APPR_RQST B ON A.RQSTNO = B.RQSTNO INNER JOIN RFID_APPR_ASSET C ON A.RQSTNO = C.RQSTNO INNER JOIN RFID_ASSET D ON C.ASSET_SEQ = D.ASSET_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT T1.* FROM RFID_APPR_IO_EXT T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT RQSTNO, MAX(EXT_RQSTNO) EXT_RQSTNO FROM RFID_APPR_IO_EXT WHERE RQST_STATUS_CD = '3' GROUP BY RQSTNO ) T2 ON T1.EXT_RQSTNO = T2.EXT_RQSTNO ) E ON A.RQSTNO = E.RQSTNO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT T1.* FROM RFID_APPR_IO_IN T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT RQSTNO, MAX(IN_RQSTNO) IN_RQSTNO FROM RFID_APPR_IO_IN WHERE RQST_STATUS_CD = '3' GROUP BY RQSTNO ) T2 ON T1.IN_RQSTNO = T2.IN_RQSTNO ) F ON A.RQSTNO = F.RQSTNO WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY RQSTNO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RFID_APPR_IO_OUT A INNER JOIN RFID_APPR_RQST B ON A.RQSTNO = B.RQSTNO WHERE 1=1

SELECT A.RQSTNO, A.OUT_DT, A.OUT_PLACE, A.EXP_IN_DT, A.REASON_CD, A.REASON, A.GUARD_SIGN_YN, A.GUARD_SIGN_DT, A.GUARD_NAME, B.RQST_REGTIME, B.RQST_USER_NO, B.RQST_USER_NAME, B.RQST_DEPT_NO, B.RQST_DEPT_NAME, B.RQST_TOP_USER_NO, B.RQST_TOP_USER_NAME, B.RQST_ASSET_CNT, B.RQST_STATUS_CD, FN_GET_CMMNCODENAME('COM008', B.RQST_STATUS_CD) RQST_STATUS_NAME, B.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, B.FRST_REGISTER_ID, B.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, B.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM RFID_APPR_IO_OUT A INNER JOIN RFID_APPR_RQST B ON A.RQSTNO = B.RQSTNO WHERE A.RQSTNO = #{rqstno}
